title: Technical Writer/Cyber Security Team Intern NEW!
full_description: COLSA Corporation is seeking passionate creative candidates from  for Technical Writing summer intern position within our Cyber Security team in Huntsville, Alabama.  You will support COLSA's Cyber Security Lab and projects and will work building training logs, documents, manuals, etc for the mission specified.
